name: Stranded (itch) (TeamEggs)
description:
Stranded

Stranded is a mystery/horror survival game where you find yourself seemingly alone on an island after your plane crashes. As you look for clues on how to get off this island, you quickly realize that you’re not alone on the island. Gather resources in order to craft traps and weapons and defend yourself against the island's monsters during the night. As the night ends, you hope that help will come quickly and that you can finally leave this accursed place.
